attributes.action: We demand that the Government bring all applications for polytunnels within the orbit of full planning controls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Acres of polytunnels are currently desecrating our countryside and covering our green and pleasant land. THIS MUST STOP!!
We are a small Parish Council which is home to Europes largest strawberry producer. We are currently seeing most of our countryside being swamped under tidal waves of plastic with no regard to the countryside and wildlife. We therefore demamd that the Government bring ALL applications for polytunnels within the orbit of full planning controls.
Thank you.
